active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a high-stakes trading environment, debate the trade-offs between using self-signed certificates for internal testing versus obtaining certificates from trusted CAs for production trading platforms. Consider security, cost, compliance (e.g., NIST SP 800-52), operational impacts, and real-world examples like NASDAQ or Binance certs. Address misconceptions such as 'self-signed certificates are always insecure.'
